workflow.title: Retrieve details on genetic marker by UniSTS numerical UID
workflow.description: The workflow retrieves the marker's primers and the organism name - if available. The organism name may not be unique for a given marker. The primers should be. It would be nice if some good soul could investigate how to retrieve the various mappings from the site. The retrieval of the primers is thought to prepare for a manual mapping of the marker's chromosomal location.
